Plot: A widow falls for a guy who bears a striking resemblance to her late husband.
Title: The Face of Love
Actors: Annette Bening, Ed Harris, Robin Williams, Jess Weixler
tomatoConsensus: Perhaps worth checking out if only for the opportunity to see reliably powerful work from Annette Bening and Ed Harris, The Face of Love undermines its leads' performances with a scattershot script and aimless direction.
